details.description:
Practicalities

Refreshments and lunch will be provided throughout the week. The evening meal on Wednesday is optional, and not included in the course price. Free Wi-Fi available. Please arrive by 9.15am on the first day to help us start at 9.30am.
details.alternative_title: Course: Open Data in Practice, 18 - 22 November, 2013
details.location: The Open Data Institute, 65 Clifton Street, London, EC2A 4JE
